name: First Wave: Alien Recon
description:
You are a UFO from an alien civilization sent on a reconnaissance mission to learn about a planet called Earth, and its dominant species, who call themselves humans.

Your job is to abduct various specimens, but to be discreet: Get more points for abductions made under the cloak of night. And be careful, you can lose points by abducting the wrong target at the wrong time.

Supports keyboard and gamepad inputs, as well as the Winnitron.
